ap.analysis package¶

Submodules¶

ap.analysis.authors module¶

ap.analysis.authors.author_email_domains(s, cutoff=2)[source]¶
ap.analysis.authors.email_tld(tld, s)[source]¶

Return number of emails using ‘.tld’.

ap.analysis.authors.multiple_authors(s)[source]¶

Return number of packages that (seem to) have multiple authors.

ap.analysis.authors.top_authors(s, limit=0)[source]¶

Returns a list of authors sorted by how many packages they have contributed to the index (by default limit is none.)

ap.analysis.authors.unique_authors(s)[source]¶

Return number of authors who have only released one package.

ap.analysis.classifiers module¶

ap.analysis.classifiers.framework_sizes_by_classifier(s)[source]¶

Return dict of Frameworks and their size based on how many packages use their framework classifier.

ap.analysis.classifiers.natural_language_distribution(s)[source]¶

Return a dict distribution of Natural Language classifiers.

ap.analysis.classifiers.nonpython_pkgs(s)[source]¶

Return a dict of non-python Language classifiers and how many times they are used.

ap.analysis.classifiers.top_classifiers(s, limit=0)[source]¶

Returns a list of classifiers sorted by how many times they are used (by default limit is none.)

ap.analysis.common module¶

ap.analysis.common.create_graph(nodelist, edgelist, directed=True)[source]¶

Build and reutrn a NetworkX graph.

ap.analysis.common.get_author_edgelist(s)[source]¶

Return edge list for Author->Package graph.

ap.analysis.common.get_author_nodelist(s)[source]¶

Return node list for Author->Package graph.

ap.analysis.common.get_pkg_edgelist(s)[source]¶

Return edge list for current Package requirement graph.

ap.analysis.common.get_pkg_nodelist(s)[source]¶

Return node list for current Package requirement graph.

ap.analysis.common.graph_to_gexf(g, path)[source]¶

Write a NetworkX graph to a GEXF format file.

ap.analysis.common.graph_to_pickle(g)[source]¶

Return a NetworkX graph as a binary Python Pickle.

ap.analysis.common.pickle_to_graph(pickle)[source]¶

Return a NetworkX graph from a Pickle.

ap.analysis.common.tuplelist_to_csv(edgelist, filename)[source]¶

Write list(/list of tuples) to CSV for import into something like Gephi.

ap.analysis.general module¶

ap.analysis.general.downloads(s)[source]¶

Return dict containing download statistics for the index.

ap.analysis.general.downloads_vs_indegree(s, filename, g=None)[source]¶

Create chart of the number of downloads per package vs. the number of times it is required, and return this data as a dict.

ap.analysis.general.find_named_ecosystems(s, cutoff=5, g=None)[source]¶

Return dict of named ecosystems and their sizes (split by . and - seperators.)

ap.analysis.general.home_page_domains(s, cutoff=5)[source]¶
ap.analysis.general.no_releases(s)[source]¶

Return total number of packages that have no release.

ap.analysis.general.no_urls(s)[source]¶

Return total number of packages that have no urls.

ap.analysis.general.pkg_num(s)[source]¶

Return total number of packages that actually exist on the index.

ap.analysis.general.top_required_packages(s, top=None, g=None)[source]¶

Return list of top required packages and the number of times they are required.

ap.analysis.releases module¶

ap.analysis.releases.avg_downloads(s)[source]¶

Return average number of downloads.

ap.analysis.releases.avg_release_age(s)[source]¶

Return average age of current releases as a datetime.timedelta object.

ap.analysis.releases.avg_release_interval(s)[source]¶

Return the average interval between releases.

ap.analysis.releases.avg_size(s)[source]¶

Return average size of releases in bytes.

ap.analysis.releases.current_num(s)[source]¶

Return number of current releases.

ap.analysis.releases.current_size(s)[source]¶

Return sum of all current release sizes in bytes.

ap.analysis.releases.major_version_distribution(s)[source]¶

Return a dict of how many current releases have a major version in [0-9].

ap.analysis.releases.minmax_size(s)[source]¶

Return the minimum and maximum release size in bytes as a tuple.

ap.analysis.releases.num(s)[source]¶

Return total number of releases.

ap.analysis.releases.total_size(s)[source]¶

Return sum of all release sizes in bytes.

Create a in degree distribution chart.

ap.analysis.requirements.packages_with_selfloops(s, g=None)[source]¶

Return a list of Packages which require themselves.
